Name: Image
Desc: Canvas-based image manipulation and processing utility.
LongDesc: The Image module provides a flexible API for creating, loading, rendering, and saving images using an HTML canvas. It supports undo/redo history, format and quality settings, and serves as the foundation for advanced image effects and editing operations.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Render('#preview'); });

var img = Q.Image({ width: 100, height: 100, fill: '#fff' });
img.Clear('#eee').Save('output.png');
